instructions: Mix flour, eggs, milk, sugar, and salt. Fry in a pan.
name: Pancake

instructions: Beat eggs in a bowl. Melt butter in a pan. Pour eggs into the pan and stir until cooked.
name: Scrambled Eggs

instructions: Boil water. Add oats and reduce heat. Cook until water is absorbed. Add sugar to taste.
name: Oatmeal

instructions: Grill chicken breast. Serve with lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers.
name: Chicken Salad

instructions: Cook penne pasta. In a separate pan, cook bacon with cheese and beaten eggs. Mix together and serve.
name: Pasta Carbonara

instructions: Grill beef steak. Serve with russet potatoes.
name: Steak and Potatoes

instructions: Cut chicken breast into strips. Stir fry with vegetables in oil. Serve with basmati rice.
name: Chicken Stir Fry

instructions: Cook penne pasta. In a separate pan, cook beef steak with tomatoes. Mix together and serve.
name: Spaghetti Bolognese

instructions: Grill salmon filet. Serve with lettuce, tomatoes, and cucumbers.
name: Salmon Salad
